content:
There is inconsistent spacing between the topic editing box and the message editing box for different kind of users. (Screenshots attached)
Normal users:
image.png
Admin:
image.png
The styling is exactly the same - the div has display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap;.
However, upon checking the box model in dev tools, the dimensions are different - the heights are different as expected.
Anyway this can be changed?
@Parth Mittal I think you'll just need to do some more debugging with your browser inspector.
There are some elements that can appear in between that are hidden; maybe that's relevant.
Figured out the problem. It was the stream editing box. The intuition came from the fact that it was the only difference in the two layouts. That had some styling that added the extra space.
